content.question: The judge’s decision in the case is best understood in the context of colonial authorities’ policy of

choices.label: encouraging the spread of indigenous Christian practices, such as the cult of the Virgin of Guadalupe
ensuring that intercommunal conflicts were brought under control before they could disrupt public order
maintaining the continued inflow of coerced labor through the asiento system
favoring Spanish-born rather than American-born individuals in official appointments and promotions

content.answer: ensuring that intercommunal conflicts were brought under control before they could disrupt public order
